section.title: Formatting expectations
section.draft-comment: Current expectations assume left-to-right reading order; should be updated to be more general.
section.p: Processors typically use the following conventions:

ul.li: The term (dt) is usually flush left.
The description or definition (dd) is either indented and on the next line or on the same line to the right of the term.
The dlhead generally looks like a table with a heading row.
